course_title: Fun With Physics: Exploring Everyday Wonders!

modules.title: Introduction to Physics
modules.description: Lay the foundation of what physics is and whet the curiosity of young minds about the world around them.

sections.title: What is Physics?
sections.description: An introduction to physics and why it is an essential science in understanding the world.

sections.title: Famous Physicists Throughout History
sections.description: Learn about the great minds that changed our understanding of the physical world.

sections.title: The Scientific Method
sections.description: Understanding the basic principles of scientific investigations and experiments.

modules.title: The Magic of Motion
modules.description: Exploring how and why things move by understanding the basic laws of motion.

sections.title: Newton's Laws of Motion
sections.description: Introduction to the three laws of motion that explain why objects move (or don't).

sections.title: Forces Around Us
sections.description: Exploring different types of forces and how they affect movement.

sections.title: Gravity, the Force That Attracts
sections.description: Understanding gravity, the force that keeps us grounded.

modules.title: Energy and Its Forms
modules.description: Discovering the different types of energy and how energy can change from one form to another.

sections.title: What is Energy?
sections.description: A basic understanding of energy and its importance.

sections.title: Potential and Kinetic Energy
sections.description: Exploring the energy of position and the energy of motion.

sections.title: Renewable and Non-Renewable Energy
sections.description: Learning about the sources of energy that can be replenished and those that cannot.

modules.title: The World of Light and Sound
modules.description: Understanding how we see and hear the world through the fascinating phenomena of light and sound.

sections.title: Basics of Light
sections.description: Exploring what light is and how it allows us to see the colors of the world.

sections.title: Shadows and Reflections
sections.description: Learning how light interacts with objects to create shadows and reflections.

sections.title: The Science of Sound
sections.description: Understanding the nature of sound and how it travels through different mediums.

modules.title: Electricity and Magnetism
modules.description: Diving into the electrifying world of electricity and the mysterious forces of magnets.

sections.title: Introduction to Electricity
sections.description: Understanding what electricity is and how we use it in our daily lives.

sections.title: Conductors and Insulators
sections.description: Learning about materials that allow electricity to flow and those that do not.

sections.title: The Power of Magnets
sections.description: Exploring how magnets work and their uses in everyday technology.

modules.title: The Wonders of Water
modules.description: Exploring the physical properties of water and its crucial role in the natural world and human life.

sections.title: States of Water
sections.description: Understanding the three states of water: solid, liquid, and gas.

sections.title: The Water Cycle
sections.description: Learning how water moves through the environment in a cycle.

sections.title: Buoyancy and Density
sections.description: Exploring why some objects float in water and others sink.

modules.title: Exploring the Universe
modules.description: A journey into the vastness of space to understand the Earth, planets, and stars.

sections.title: Our Planet Earth
sections.description: Learning about the Earth's unique properties that support life.

sections.title: The Solar System
sections.description: Exploring the planets and other celestial bodies that orbit the sun.

sections.title: Constellations and Galaxies
sections.description: Understanding the patterns formed by stars and the vast collections of stars known as galaxies.

modules.title: Brilliant Experiments and Projects
modules.description: Hands-on experiments and projects to reinforce learning and apply concepts in a fun, creative way.

sections.title: Creating a Simple Circuit
sections.description: A step-by-step guide to building a basic electrical circuit.

sections.title: DIY Telescope
sections.description: Building a simple telescope to explore the night sky.

sections.title: Water Cycle in a Bag
sections.description: A fun experiment to visualize the water cycle using everyday items.
